{{Wireless embedded system |brand=MikroTik |model=RouterBOARD 751 |revision=G-2HnD (RB751G-2HnD) |upc=893191002904 |ean= |asin=B005Z7QHDW |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/14/2012 |manuf_country=Latvia |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=access point |fcc_id=TV7RB751G-2HND |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=ns |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7242;AR7242-AH1A; |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=64 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F1208U0C-PCB0 |fla1_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16DG-AC |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9283 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=MMCX |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |stock_boot=RouterBOOT |stock_os=RouterOS L4 |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=MikroTik |default_ssid_regex=^MikroTik$ |default_ip=192.168.88.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:0C:42,D4:CA:6D |oui_eth=00:0C:42,D4:CA:6D }} [http://routerboard.com/RB751G-2HnD Product page]
Per the manual, the default SSID is '''MikroTik'''. :Probable 00:0C:42 OUI
